user_or_team_check.name: user_or_team_check
user_or_team_check.value: ("board_access"."user_id" IS NOT NULL AND "board_access"."team_id" IS NULL) OR ("board_access"."user_id" IS NULL AND "board_access"."team_id" IS NOT NULL)

task_or_comment_check.name: task_or_comment_check
task_or_comment_check.value: ("attachments"."task_id" IS NOT NULL AND "attachments"."comment_id" IS NULL) OR ("attachments"."task_id" IS NULL AND "attachments"."comment_id" IS NOT NULL)

invite_target_check.name: invite_target_check
invite_target_check.value:
(
        ("rollup_invitations"."user_id" IS NOT NULL AND "rollup_invitations"."team_id" IS NULL AND "rollup_invitations"."all_users" = false) OR
        ("rollup_invitations"."user_id" IS NULL AND "rollup_invitations"."team_id" IS NOT NULL AND "rollup_invitations"."all_users" = false) OR
        ("rollup_invitations"."user_id" IS NULL AND "rollup_invitations"."team_id" IS NULL AND "rollup_invitations"."all_users" = true)
      )
